adapter.outputcontainer-description: Add a note-toolbar-output callout with a unique meta field to your note to put text output.

export.button-copy-link-description: Copy this link to your clipboard
export.label-share-description: Share this link with another Note Toolbar user to add your toolbar to their vault.
export.notice-completed: Toolbar copied to clipboard as callout. Open settings to adjust formatting.
export.notice-shared: Note Toolbar link copied to clipboard
export.option-uri-description: Provides an obsidian:// link instead of an https:// URL.
export.warning-share-length: Some web browsers may not load a URL that is longer than 2,048 characters.
export.warning-share-menu: This toolbar refers to at least one other toolbar that the recipient won't receive.

gallery.error-invalid-plugin: Invalid plugin or none enabled for Gallery item.
gallery.error-missing-item-type: Gallery item: Missing item type property
gallery.error-missing-property: Missing plugin or script property in Gallery data.
gallery.label-add-item: Click or tap to add any of these to a toolbar:
gallery.title: Note Toolbar Gallery
gallery.tooltip-add-item: Add this item to a toolbar

import.error-invalid-uri-content: Note Toolbar: It looks like there's an issue with this link. Check the URI is correct, or review the user guide.
import.label-import: Paste a Note Toolbar Callout below and it will be added as a new toolbar.
import.label-import-confirmation: Confirm you would like to add this toolbar. Once added, this toolbar will need to be mapped to one or more notes.
import.label-import-into: Paste a Note Toolbar Callout below and its items will be added to this toolbar. Styles will be ignored if provided.
import.label-import-into-help: The callout heading is not needed, and will be ignored if provided.
import.warning-invalid-plugins: This toolbar uses plugins you do not have installed and enabled:
import.warning-vars: This toolbar uses variables, which you can modify to work with your vault.

notice.error-command-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this command. Command not found: {{command}}
notice.error-folder-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this folder. Folder not found: {{folder}}
notice.error-item-menu-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this menu item. Toolbar not found: {{toolbar}}
notice.error-scripting-not-enabled: Enable Scripting in Note Toolbar settings to use this item.
notice.error-scripting-plugin-not-enabled: Toggle the Scripting setting after installing and enabling plugin: {{plugin}}
notice.error-toolbar-not-found: Check Note Toolbar setting or URI for this toolbar. Toolbar not found: {{toolbar}}
notice.error-uri-params-not-supported: One or more of these Note Toolbar URI parameters is not supported: {{params}}
notice.warning-no-matching-toolbar:
Note Toolbar: No matching toolbar: {{toolbar}}
Click/Tap here to create it.

onboarding.new-toolbar-mapping-content: To see this toolbar in your note, add a property ({{property}}) with the name of this toolbar. Or, map this toolbar to the folder the note is in (Note Toolbar Settings ‚Üí Folder mappings).
onboarding.swap-toolbar-content: Selecting an option below will update this note by changing or removing the value of a property ({{property}}).

add-item.label-confirm-command:
Command is not supported or was not found:

`{{commandId}}`

Would you still like to add this item to a toolbar? You can install/enable the plugin that provides this command later.
add-item.label-confirm-mobile-uri:
This item uses a file URI which may not be supported on mobile.

Would you still like to add this item to a toolbar?
add-item.label-confirm-plugin:
Plugin not installed and enabled:

**{{plugin}}**

Would you still like to add this item to a toolbar? You can install/enable this plugin later.
add-item.label-confirm-scripting:
In order to use this item, the _Scripting_ setting in Note Toolbar's settings must be enabled.

This setting allows your toolbar to execute JavaScript, and to use Dataview, Templater, and JS Engine (assuming you have those plugins installed and enabled).

Would you like to enable this setting now?

copy-as-callout.description: Define what happens when toolbars are converted to callouts.
copy-as-callout.option-data-description: Data elements allow toolbars opened in new windows to still work. If disabled, Note Toolbar URIs will be used instead of data elements, and also provide cleaner-looking markdown.
copy-as-callout.option-icons-description: Add icon placeholders to callouts. (Example: :LiHome:) The Iconize plugin must be installed and enabled to see icons. If disabled, tooltips will be used if labels are not set. Icons can be imported by other users.
copy-as-callout.option-ids-description: This ensures menu items still work for you if the menu toolbar's renamed. If you want to share callouts, turn this off, and the toolbar's name will be used instead.
copy-as-callout.option-vars-description: Any variables and expressions used in the toolbar will be replaced with values from the note you're currently viewing. Example: {{note_title}} ‚Üí My Note
copy-as-callout.title: Copy as callout

delete-toolbar.label-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this toolbar?
delete-toolbar.label-usage-note: This toolbar may be used in a `{{propertyName}}` property. If you want to make sure, close this window and search for `[{{propertyName}}: {{toolbarName}}]`
delete-toolbar.name: Delete this toolbar
delete-toolbar.title: Delete toolbar: {{toolbar}}

display-contexts.description: Enable toolbars in canvases, PDFs, video, and other file types.
display-contexts.name: File types
display-contexts.option-filemenu-description: Adds an item to the File menu to access the toolbar in the linked note.
display-contexts.option-other-description: List of other data types toolbars can appear in, separated by spaces.

display-locations.description: Define where toolbars are shown across the app.
display-locations.name: Toolbars within the app
display-locations.option-editor-menu-description: Replaces the Editor menu with the chosen toolbar.
display-locations.option-editor-menu-error: Error: Editor menu toolbar not found. Check your settings.
display-locations.option-editor-menu-as-tbar: Display Editor menu as a toolbar
display-locations.option-editor-menu-as-tbar-description: By default the toolbar is shown as a menu. Enable to show as a toolbar instead.
display-locations.option-emptyview-tbar-description: Display a toolbar when no note is open.
display-locations.option-launchpad: Replace new tab view with toolbar
display-locations.option-launchpad-description: Replace the new tab view with a large version of this toolbar. If not enabled, the toolbar will be in the position selected in its settings.
display-locations.option-text-description: Display a toolbar when text is selected.

ribbon-action.description: Set the action to take when the ribbon icon (on phones) is used.
ribbon-action.name: Ribbon üì±

display-rules.description: Define which notes to display toolbars on, using a property, mappings, or both.
display-rules.name: Display rules
display-rules.option-property-description: If a toolbar name is found in this property, the toolbar will be displayed on the note. This takes precedence over any folder mappings. In a note, set this property to 'none' to hide the toolbar.

setting.error-old-settings-description: Old settings file loaded ({{oldVersion}}) but latest is {{currentVersion}}
setting.error-old-settings-name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error: Please disable and renable Note Toolbar, or restart Obsidian.
setting.error-invalid-text-toolbar: Error: Selected text toolbar does not exist. Check your settings.

help.heading: Help using Note Toolbar
help.label-article-1-description: Learn about the different types of items.
help.label-article-2-description: Learn how to create toolbars within your notes.
help.label-donate-description: If you find this plugin useful, and wish to support me financially, consider donating. Thank you!
help.label-feedback-description: Use this quick Google form for any feedback, questions, or ideas you may have.
help.label-gallery-description: Visit the Gallery to add ready-to-use items to your toolbars.
help.title: Note Toolbar Help

item.label-preview-empty-no-items: No items. Edit this toolbar to add items.
item.menu-copy-id-notice: Toolbar item ID copied to clipboard.
item.option-command-error-not-available-insta: This command is not available. Plugin must be installed and enabled.
item.option-command-error-not-available-searc: This command cannot be found. Try searching again.
item.option-command-check-description: If the command cannot be performed in the current context, the item will be disabled in the toolbar.
item.option-command-focus-description: Set focus in editor after the command is executed.
item.option-command-help: Runs a command when this item is used.
item.option-command-target-description: Some commands may override this setting.
item.option-dataview-help: Runs a Dataview query, evaluates an expression, or executes a script.
item.option-file-error-does-not-exist: This file or folder does not exist.
item.option-file-help: Opens file or highlights folder when this item is used.
item.option-file-target-description: Using modifier keys or plugins may override this setting.
item.option-item-group-help: Inserts selected toolbar into this one.
item.option-item-menu-help: Opens selected toolbar as a menu.
item.option-js-engine-help: Executes or evaluates JavaScript using JS Engine.
item.option-script-focus-description: Set focus in editor after the script is executed.
item.option-templater-help: Inserts a template, creates a new note from a template, or executes Templater commands and files.
item.option-uri-help: Opens a website or vault location.
item.option-uri-target-description: Using modifier keys or plugins may override this setting.
item.option-uri-target-disclaimer-device: This option does nothing on this device.
item.option-uri-target-disclaimer-non-default: External links require the Web Viewer plugin to be enabled, to use options other than Default. Available on desktop only.
item.title: Edit toolbar item

item-suggest-modal.placeholder: Search for an item to add...
item-suggest-modal.placeholder-use: Search for an item to use...

items.button-add-break-tooltip: Add a line break to the toolbar
items.button-add-separator-tooltip: Add a separator to the toolbar
items.button-find-item-tooltip: Find an item to add to the toolbar
items.button-new-item-tooltip: Add a new item to the toolbar
items.description: Add items to the toolbar, in order.
items.name: Items

mappings.description: Notes in folders below will display the toolbar mapped to it. Precedence is top to bottom.
mappings.error-folder-already-mapped: This folder already has a toolbar associated with it.
mappings.label-empty: Use the button to create a mapping.
mappings.name: Folder mappings

name.description: Give this toolbar a unique name.
name.error-toolbar-already-exists: A toolbar already exists with this name.
name.name: Name

open-command.description: Add a command that opens this toolbar in a Quick Tools window.
open-command.name: Add toolbar command

debugging.description: If enabled, debug messages will be shown in the console. This might be useful for developers and for troubleshooting problems.
debugging.name: Debugging

icon.description: Sets the icon for Note Toolbar when used in the tab bar, floating button, and navigation bar (on phone). Requires restart.
icon.name: Icon

keep-props-state.description: Maintains the visibility state of Properties in notes, if you use Note Toolbar's options to toggle properties. If enabled, you will have to use Note Toolbar's "Show note properties" to show properties again.
keep-props-state.name: Keep properties view state

load-settings-changes.description: If you‚Äôre syncing plugin settings across devices, turn this on to automatically load toolbar updates. If not, you‚Äôll need to restart Obsidian to see changes from other devices.
load-settings-changes.name: Load settings changes

lock-callouts.description: Note Toolbar Callouts will not be expanded for editing on click. If enabled, use the Edit option in the callout menu to make changes.
lock-callouts.name: Lock Note Toolbar Callouts

scripting.description: Adds support for Dataview, JS Engine, and Templater, which must be installed and enabled.
scripting.name: Scripting

show-edit-tbar.description: Adds an item to access the toolbar's settings in toolbars that are displayed as menus, for convenience.
show-edit-tbar.name: Show "Edit toolbar" in toolbar menus

position.name: Position
position.notice-defaultitem-invalid: Invalid default item for floating button. Check toolbar configuration.
position.option-defaultitem-description: Instead of the toolbar menu, show this item as the button. Other items appear in right-click menu (long-press on mobile).
position.option-fab-desktop-native-menus-disclaim: Disable Obsidian's Appearance ‚Üí Native menus option, if you want icons to appear floating button menus.
position.option-mobile-help: Tip: Access toolbars from the navigation bar.

rules.button-newcondition-tooltip: Add a new condition to this rule
rules.description: Rules that define which notes to display toolbars on.
rules.error-folder-already-mapped: This folder already has a toolbar associated with it. Precedence is top to bottom.
rules.label-empty: Use the button to create a rule.
rules.name: Rules

styles.description: List of styles to apply to the toolbar.
styles.help: Customize even more with the Style Settings plugin.
styles.name: Styles
styles.option-autohide-disclaimer: Auto-hide does not apply on mobile.
styles.option-custom-description: List of classes defined in CSS snippets to apply to this toolbar, separated by spaces.
styles.option-default-description: Applies to all platforms unless overridden.
styles.option-mobile-empty: No mobile styles set. Using default styles.
styles.option-nowrap-disclaimer: Works best if items are not evenly spaced or centered.
styles.option-sticky-disclaimer: Sticky does not apply in Reading mode.
styles.title: Style toolbar: {{toolbar}}

toolbars.label-empty-create-tbar: Use the button to create a toolbar.
toolbars.name: Toolbars

usage.description_none: This toolbar is not used in any mappings or items.
usage.name: Usage

use-item-command.error-noname: Command must be re-added. At least one label or tooltip must not be empty or contain expressions.
use-item-command.notice-command-error-noname: Unable to add command. Ensure item has a name or label set, and at least one does not include variables or an expression.
use-item-command.notice-command-error-startup-noname: Note Toolbar: Some item commands in these toolbars were not added due to empty labels or tooltips: {{toolbars}}

whats-new.label-release-notes-description: Detailed notes for the latest releases are on GitHub.
whats-new.label-roadmap-description: Check out the Roadmap to preview the features under consideration.
whats-new.title: What's new in Note Toolbar?
